channel.title: Comments on: 10 things I loved about magical Cappadocia

item.title: By: Henry Muuthia
item.dc:creator: Henry Muuthia
item.description: The photos are just out of this world. I really look forward to visiting this place one of these fine days - i never knew Turkey was this beautiful. Now i have added a new badge of fame to Turkey besides great fine men's suits - spectacular scenic beauty!
item.content:encoded: The photos are just out of this world. I really look forward to visiting this place one of these fine days – i never knew Turkey was this beautiful. Now i have added a new badge of fame to Turkey besides great fine men’s suits – spectacular scenic beauty!
